title: Indentation guides overlap in other windows
body:
### Summary

Indentation guides show on other other helix windows when resizing to smaller terminal emulator windows

https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/79347623/179360202-6c8b6565-f8a3-48bc-a5f4-91e667b17572.mov


### Reproduction Steps

<!-- Ideally provide a key sequence and/or asciinema.org recording. --> 

1. `hx` in a fullscreen or almost fullscreen terminal window
2. Open two files and do a vertical split 
3. In the right side helix window go to the end of a long line.
4. Resize the terminal window (reducing the width of it)
5. The indentation lines from the right side helix window will show over the left side helix window.
